quote: I put my rainbow in the cloud, and it will serve as a sign of the covenant between me and the earth.
The vine replied to them, ‘Must I give up my new wine that makes God and men rejoice to go and wave over the trees?’
But he said to them: “You give them something to eat.” They said: “We have nothing more than five loaves and two fish, unless perhaps we ourselves go and buy food for all these people.”
